verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: At a campaign rally in front of thousands of attendees] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: spent] [ARG1: a chunk of his speech taking aim at Democrats , particularly Sen. Debbie Stabenow] .
At a campaign rally in front of thousands of attendees , President Donald Trump spent a chunk of [ARG0: his speech] [V: taking] [ARG1: aim] [ARG2: at Democrats , particularly Sen. Debbie Stabenow] .
